title: Lesson 19
paragraph: This lesson covers medicine and health, including diagnosis, treatment, and public health concepts.

words.meaning: the study of diseases and their causes or effects
words.example: Pathology helps doctors understand disease mechanisms.

words.meaning: the expected outcome of a disease or condition
words.example: The prognosis for the patient was positive after treatment.

words.meaning: the study of the causes of diseases
words.example: Etiology helps identify the source of infections.

words.meaning: the collection of symptoms associated with a disease
words.example: Symptomatology guides doctors in diagnosing illnesses.
Therapeutic exercise improves recovery after injury.

words.meaning: relieving symptoms without curing the underlying disease
words.example: Palliative care focuses on patient comfort.
The new drug has curative effects on the condition.

words.meaning: related to identifying a disease or condition
relating to the preparation and sale of drugs
relating to the study of disease spread in populations
words.example: Epidemiological studies track outbreaks of infectious diseases.
